mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE board_num = #{bno} and board_writer = #{writer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_title, board_content, board_writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT board_num, board_title, board_content, board_writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date FROM board ORDER BY reg_date DESC, board_num DESC
mapper.sql: SELECT board_num, board_title, board_content, board_writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date FROM board
mapper.select: ORDER BY reg_date DESC, board_num DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
